select.if:
SELECT t.table_name AS tableName,t.TABLE_COMMENT AS comment FROM information_schema.`TABLES` t WHERE t.TABLE_SCHEMA = (select database()) and t.table_name not in (select a.table_name from online_table a)
AND t.TABLE_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{tableName}, '%')
AND t.TABLE_COMMENT like CONCAT('%', #{comment}, '%')
ORDER BY t.TABLE_NAME
